thread.title: Brit Awards 2017: Bastille and Blossoms prove they're just like us as they get tube to ceremony
thread.title_full: Brit Awards 2017: Bastille and Blossoms prove they're just like us as they get tube to ceremony

author: Jennifer ruby
title: Brit Awards 2017: Bastille and Blossoms prove they're just like us as they get tube to ceremony
text:
Brit Awards 2017: Bastille and Blossoms prove they’re just like us as they get tube to ceremony 
They might be famous musicians but they haven't let fame go to their heads Wednesday 22 February 2017 19:05 GMT Click to followES Entertainment Down to earth: Bastille get the tube to the Brit Awards Bastille/Twitter 
While most musicians were being ferried to the Brit Awards by chauffeurs, Bastille and Blossoms opted for a more low-key mode of transport. Both British bands decided to get the tube to the O2 on Wednesday night to beat the rush hour traffic. Proving that they haven’t let their new found fame go to their heads, chart-topping indie pop band Blossoms posted a photo of themselves mid-journey. “Tube to the Brits #workingclassladz @BRITs #BRITs,” they wrote on their official Twitter account. Tube to the Brits #workingclassladz @BRITs #BRITs pic.twitter.com/0nRgk7VBOU — B L O S S O M S (@BlossomsBand) February 22, 2017 And the award for the least organised band goes to.... pic.twitter.com/aliePFM1Kz
